word:
"And the publican, standing afar off, would not lift up so much as his eyes unto heaven, but smote upon his breast, 
                                                                           314
saying, God be merciful to me a sinner. I tell you, this man went down to his house justified rather than the other: for every one that exalteth himself shall be abased; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted" (Luke 18:13, 14).
